label30: Multi-directional, double-lock mechanism of battery door
label33: Powerful, DSLR-quality Image Processor and a cutting-edge BSI CMOS sensor come together to dramatically improve image quality with spectacular low-light performance, blazing fast autofocus, enhanced Intelligent Auto for spectacular scene and subject recognition and Super-Resolution Zoom

label36: Simply set the mode dial to "A", to make adjustments

label13: Complete sealing system and double lock construction
label10: Several protective coatings help to prevent scratches and cut down on reflective glare from bright lights and sun

connectivity: AV Output, DC Input, HDMI D, USB 2.0

burstrate: Up to 5 fps at 12 MP for up to 25 frames Up to 15 fps at 3 MP for up to 100 frames Up to 60 fps at 3 MP for up to 100 frames
